name: Jiggle Out
description:
Jiggle Out is a fodian game where you play as a squid who fell down into a cave on his way to his cousin's uncle's nephew's son's birthday party and now has to swim between pockets of water up to the surface, an inspiring, patience testing, growing experience.

Programmer, developer, songwriter and game designer: PABLOXSS

Sprite Artist Main Mechanic and creator of the trailer: PinoPrime

Certified piano man: 🐖
